location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'MAP 9. TO ILLUSTRATE THE BATTLE OF CTESIPHON.'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed in colour on paperDimensions: 275 x 240mm, on sheet 360 x 290mm

mods.abstract: The map accompanies The Campaign in Mesopotamia 1914-1918. Volume II, and shows a region around Ctesiphon in central and eastern Iraq, indicating military operations, fortifications, settlements, roads and watercourses.Prepared in the Historical Section of the Committee of Imperial Defence, and printed at the Ordnance Survey in 1923.
